name: AaronTM
shortBio: Student, builder, and writer navigating the worlds of AI and theology.
about: Hi, I’m Aaron. I’m currently pursuing my BTech in CSE (3rd year) with a strong focus on AI-ML Research, Statistics, and Data science.
Outside my technical work, I’m involved in theology, music, writing, and public speaking.
On my blog Arise With Him, I share insights on Scripture, theology, liturgy, Church history, and the Christian life.
I also play the Western Classical flute and have a personal interest in world linguistics and writing systems.
Feel free to check out the links below for more of my work.
